languages.text: {n}Эльдарка награждает вас презрительным взглядом.{/n} "Муаран был прав в одном: ваше примитивное сознание не позволяет вам зрить то, что не лежит на поверхности. Мое деяние было сотворено не из желания угодить тебе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдарка награждает вас презрительным взглядом.{/n} "Муаран был прав в одном: ваше примитивное сознание не позволяет вам зрить то, что не лежит на поверхности. Мое деяние было сотворено не из желания угодить тебе".

languages.text: {n}Yrliet rewards you with a contemptuous look.{/n} "Muaran was right about one thing: your primitive consciousness prevents you from seeing anything that does not lie on the surface. My actions were not done out of a desire to gratify you."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарка награждает вас презрительным взглядом.{/n} "Муаран был прав в одном: ваше примитивное сознание не позволяет вам зрить то, что не лежит на поверхности. Мое деяние было сотворено не из желания угодить тебе".

{n}Yrliet rewards you with a contemptuous look.{/n} "Muaran was right about one thing: your primitive consciousness prevents you from seeing anything that does not lie on the surface. My actions were not done out of a desire to gratify you."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特轻蔑地看了你一眼。{/n}“穆兰有一点倒是没说错，你原始的意识导致你只能看得到最表层的东西。我刚刚的所作所为，并不是为了满足你的愿望。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet rewards you with a contemptuous look.{/n} "Muaran was right about one thing: your primitive consciousness prevents you from seeing anything that does not lie on the surface. My actions were not done out of a desire to gratify you."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特轻蔑地看了你一眼。{/n}“穆兰有一点倒是没说错，你原始的意识导致你只能看得到最表层的东西。我刚刚的所作所为，并不是为了满足你的愿望。”

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは報いとばかりに蔑んだ目でこちらを見る。{/n}「1点だけ、ムアランが正しかったことがある。人間の感覚は原始的だから、外見上存在しないものを見ることができない。我は、あなたを喜ばせるために行動したわけではなかった」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet rewards you with a contemptuous look.{/n} "Muaran was right about one thing: your primitive consciousness prevents you from seeing anything that does not lie on the surface. My actions were not done out of a desire to gratify you."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは報いとばかりに蔑んだ目でこちらを見る。{/n}「1点だけ、ムアランが正しかったことがある。人間の感覚は原始的だから、外見上存在しないものを見ることができない。我は、あなたを喜ばせるために行動したわけではなかった」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet wirft dir einen verächtlichen Blick zu.{/n} "Mit einer Sache hatte Muaran recht: Euer primitives Bewusstsein lässt Euch nichts erkennen, was nicht direkt an der Oberfläche liegt. Mein Handeln erwuchs nicht aus dem Wunsch, Euch zu erfreuen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet rewards you with a contemptuous look.{/n} "Muaran was right about one thing: your primitive consciousness prevents you from seeing anything that does not lie on the surface. My actions were not done out of a desire to gratify you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet wirft dir einen verächtlichen Blick zu.{/n} "Mit einer Sache hatte Muaran recht: Euer primitives Bewusstsein lässt Euch nichts erkennen, was nicht direkt an der Oberfläche liegt. Mein Handeln erwuchs nicht aus dem Wunsch, Euch zu erfreuen."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet vous gratifie d'un regard méprisant.{/n} « Muaran avait raison sur un point : votre conscience primitive ne vous permet pas de voir au-delà du superficiel. La façon dont j'ai agi n'avait pas pour but de vous satisfaire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet rewards you with a contemptuous look.{/n} "Muaran was right about one thing: your primitive consciousness prevents you from seeing anything that does not lie on the surface. My actions were not done out of a desire to gratify you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet vous gratifie d'un regard méprisant.{/n} « Muaran avait raison sur un point : votre conscience primitive ne vous permet pas de voir au-delà du superficiel. La façon dont j'ai agi n'avait pas pour but de vous satisfaire. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te recompensa con una mirada de desprecio.{/n} «Muaran tenía razón en algo: tu mente primitiva te impide ver lo que yace más allá de la superficie. Mis acciones no se deben a un deseo de gratificarte».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet rewards you with a contemptuous look.{/n} "Muaran was right about one thing: your primitive consciousness prevents you from seeing anything that does not lie on the surface. My actions were not done out of a desire to gratify you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te recompensa con una mirada de desprecio.{/n} «Muaran tenía razón en algo: tu mente primitiva te impide ver lo que yace más allá de la superficie. Mis acciones no se deben a un deseo de gratificarte».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sana horgörüyle bakıyor.{/n} "Muaran tek bir konuda haklıymış: İlkel bilincin, yüzeyin ötesinde yatan şeyleri görmene engel oluyor. Eylemlerim seni hoşnut kılma arzusuyla gerçekleştirilmedi."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet rewards you with a contemptuous look.{/n} "Muaran was right about one thing: your primitive consciousness prevents you from seeing anything that does not lie on the surface. My actions were not done out of a desire to gratify you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet sana horgörüyle bakıyor.{/n} "Muaran tek bir konuda haklıymış: İlkel bilincin, yüzeyin ötesinde yatan şeyleri görmene engel oluyor. Eylemlerim seni hoşnut kılma arzusuyla gerçekleştirilmedi."
